mapper.insert: insert into members(m_email, m_id, m_pw, m_tel, m_jumin, m_gender) values (#{m_email}, #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_tel}, #{m_jumin}, #{m_gender})
mapper.select: select count(*) from members where m_id = #{m_id}
select * from members where m_id = #{m_id} and m_pw = #{m_pw}
select m_id from members where m_email = #{m_email}
select m_pw from members where m_id = #{m_id} and m_tel = #{m_tel}
select m_email,m_id,m_tel,m_tier from members where m_idx = #{m_idx}
